thread.title: EU Probing ‘Anticompetitive Behavior in Precious Metals Spot Trading’
thread.title_full: EU Probing ‘Anticompetitive Behavior in Precious Metals Spot Trading’ - WSJ

author: Gabriele Steinhauser
title: EU Probing ‘Anticompetitive Behavior in Precious Metals Spot Trading’
text:
BRUSSELS—The European Union’s competition watchdog is investigating alleged “anticompetitive behavior in precious metals spot trading,” a spokesman said.
The spokesman for the European Commission, Ricardo Cardoso, declined to give more details on the probe.
The Wall Street Journal reported in February that U.S. officials are probing at...
